math.text: For what model year is the percent of cars for sale the smallest?
What is the probability of selecting a bead that has a defect?
In the figure, line m is parallel to line n, and line t intersects both lines. What is the value of x?
What is the y-intercept of the graph shown?
What is the total cost to lease a car when the monthly payment is $400?
Each side of a square has a length of 45. What is the perimeter of this square?
At a speed of 12 cm/s, how long will it take to travel 108 cm?
Which statement correctly compares the mean of data set X and the mean of data set Y?
options: The mean of data set X is greater than the mean of data set Y.
The mean of data set X is less than the mean of data set Y.
The means of data set X and data set Y are equal.
There is not enough information to compare the means.
math.correctAnswer: The mean of data set X is less than the mean of data set Y.

math.text: On average, how much propellant did the rocket burn each second after launch?
If 4 + x^2 = 12, what is the value of 16x + 8?
What was the height, in meters, from which the object was kicked?
For what value of x does f(x) = 4x^2 - 50x + 126 reach its minimum?
What is the maximum number of large candles the owner can purchase to stay within the budget?
Which equation defines the linear function f?
What is the length of arc QR?

english.text: Which choice completes the text with the most logical and precise word or phrase? Benito Juarez became one of the most ______ figures in his country’s history.
Many of John Ashbery’s poems can be quite difficult to ______ and thus are the object of heated debate among scholars.
This ______ change in the fossil record might be due to a shift in many organisms to body types that were more likely to be preserved.
The accessory spleen may actively support diving mechanisms.
This finding may persuade researchers to ______ that women may have also held leadership roles.
Due to their experimental syntax, many poems are ______.
John Redding’s imagination was ______ compared to others in his town.
Which choice completes the text: Night wears a garment ______?
Tadpole shrimp ______ for long drought periods.
